content.thinking: Looking at this document, I need to analyze it according to the workflow provided. 1. TEXT EXTRACTION: I can see text including: - "DIAN" logo and branding - "Reporte de Beneficiarios Finales" (Report of Final Beneficiaries) - "2687" (form number) - Company name: "LINALCA INFORMATICA S.A.S. - BIC" - Person name: "SANCHEZ FERRE JUAN CLAUDIO" - "Cédula de Ciudadanía" - Various form fields and sections about "beneficiarios finales" (final beneficiaries) - Questions about "acciones al portador" (bearer shares) - Date stamps and signatures 2. PRIORITY CHECKS: This is not BLANK (has substantial content) and not LINK_ONLY (no URLs redirecting elsewhere) 3. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS: - The main purpose is clearly stated: "Reporte de Beneficiarios Finales" (Final Beneficiaries Report) - This identifies final beneficiaries of a company -> RUB Indicative - It's not a personal ID document, tax registration, company existence certificate, or shareholding composition document 4. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION: - Document is issued by DIAN (Dirección de Impuestos y Aduanas Nacionales) - DIAN is the Colombian tax authority -> This supports RUB 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION: Looking at the RUB definition: - Contains keywords: "Reporte de Beneficiarios Finales" ✓ - Document issued by DIAN ✓ - Contains numbered form structure by DIAN ✓ - Purpose is final beneficiary transparency ✓ This clearly matches the RUB category definition for Final Beneficiary Registration Document issued by a tax authority.
